charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 841 (a)(1)-Possession of Marijuana with intent to distribute (Felony) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Cnt 1-Custody of Bureau of Prisons for 12 mos and 1 day; spv release for 3 yrs; supervision waived if deported, excluded, etc.; $100 penalty assessment; no fine/restitution due to inability to pay (1)
